Option.Name: Damage Level Change before Poise Break
Remove Effect If Torch In Hand
Follow and warp to player (Spirit Summon)
Scale Attack Power with Equip Load

iconId.Wiki: Icon ID (When -1, no icon is required)

conditionHp.Wiki: Set what percentage of maxHP the remaining HP will be activated

effectEndurance.Wiki: Change duration / -1 for permanent / 0 for one moment only

motionInterval.Wiki: Set how many seconds it occurs

slashDamageCutRate.Wiki: Slash damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

blowDamageCutRate.Wiki: Batter damage ratio: The calculated damage is corrected by XX times. 1 is normal.

thrustDamageCutRate.Wiki: Puncture damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

damageCutRate_Kinetic.Wiki: Kinetic damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

damageCutRate_Energy.Wiki: Energy damage multiplier: The calculated damage is corrected by XX times. 1 is normal.

damageCutRate_Explosive.Wiki: Explosive damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

damageCutRate_Coral.Wiki: Coral damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

attackRate_Kinetic.Wiki: Kinetic damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

attackRate_Energy.Wiki: Energy damage multiplier: The calculated damage is corrected by XX times. 1 is normal.

attackRate_Explosive.Wiki: Explosive damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

attackRate_Coral.Wiki: Coral damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

attackPowerRate_Kinetic.Wiki: Multiply the Kinetic attack power by the set value

attackPowerRate_Energy.Wiki: Multiply the Energy attack power by the set value

attackPowerRate_Explosive.Wiki: Multiply the Explosive attack power by the set value

attackPowerRate_Coral.Wiki: Multiply the Coral attack power by the set value

attackPower_Kinetic.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for Kinetic attack power

attackPower_Energy.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for the Energy attack power

attackPower_Explosive.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for Explosive attack power

attackPower_Coral.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for the Coral attack power

defRate_Kinetic.Wiki: Multiply the set value for Kinetic defense

defRate_Energy.Wiki: Multiply the value set for Energy defense

defRate_Explosive.Wiki: Multiply the Explosive defense by the set value

defRate_Coral.Wiki: Multiply the value set for the Coral defense

def_Kinetic.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for Kinetic defense

def_Energy.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for Energy defense

def_Explosive.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for the Explosive defense

def_Coral.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for the Coral defense

noGuardDamageRate.Wiki: Replace the damage ratio at the time of the gap with the set value (set on the damage side)

vitalSpotChangeRate.Wiki: Replaces the damage calculation of the sweet spot with the specified value (key point damage correction) -Invalid at 1.0

normalSpotChangeRate.Wiki: Replaces normal hit damage calculation with the specified number -Invalid at 1.0

lookAtTargetPosOffset.Wiki: Offset the target position when the enemy looks at. Set to crouch or mount on the side to be seen

behaviorId.Wiki:
Specified -1 when dealing damage using action ID from special effects
NPC Behavior - Requires State Info 142
Player Behavior - Requires State Info 275
Bullet Behavior - Requires State Info 33

changeHpRate.Wiki: Set what percentage of the maximum HP to subtract (or add) with one activation

changeHpPoint.Wiki: Set how many points to subtract (or add) with one activation

changeMpRate.Wiki: Set what percentage of the maximum MP to subtract (or add) with one activation

changeMpPoint.Wiki: Set how many points to subtract (or add) with one activation

mpRecoverChangeSpeed.Wiki: Change the recovery speed. Add or subtract to the standard recovery speed and initial recovery speed of the recovery formula.

changeStaminaRate.Wiki: Set what percentage of the maximum stamina to subtract (or add) with one activation

changeStaminaPoint.Wiki: Set how many points to subtract (or add) with one activation

staminaRecoverChangeSpeed.Wiki: Change the recovery speed. Add or subtract to the standard recovery speed and initial recovery speed of the recovery formula.

magicEffectTimeChange.Wiki: Add / subtract the time set for the effect duration only for magic that has the effect duration set to 0.1 seconds or more.

insideDurability.Wiki: Add or subtract the numerical value to the internal wear degree

maxDurability.Wiki: Add the set value to the maximum value of the internal wear degree of durability.

staminaAttackRate.Wiki: Multiply the stamina attack power by a factor (1.0 1 times 0.5 half)

registStatus_AcsAnomaly.Wiki: A value to be added to the target's ACS Anomaly resistance when it hits\nRequires State Info 2

registStatus_ElecDischarge.Wiki: Numerical value to be added to the target Electric Discharge resistance when hit\nRequires State Info 5

registStatus_Plasma.Wiki: A value to be added to the target's Plasma resistance when it hits\nRequires State Info 6

registStatus_ElecDischargeType2.Wiki: A number to be added to the target Unknown resistance when hit\nRequires State Info 116

fallDamageRate.Wiki: Multiply the damage calculation when falling

soulRate.Wiki: The amount of soul acquired when defeating an enemy is added by the specified multiple.\nRequires State Info 76

equipWeightChangeRate.Wiki: Multiply the maximum equipment weight by the set magnification

allItemWeightChangeRate.Wiki: Multiply the maximum weight you have by the set magnification

soul.Wiki: Add the set value to the possessed soul

haveSoulRate.Wiki: For enemy lap effect. It is applied when the soul goes out from the set character.

targetPriority.Wiki: Chance for an enemy to switch aggro targets to/away the effect's owner. Values range from -1 to 1. +1 = 100% chance to target owner instead of current target, -1 = 100% chance to target somebody else instead of current target (effect owner).

sightSearchEnemyCut.Wiki: Correct the ease of finding by a magnification

hearingSearchEnemyCut.Wiki: Correct the loudness of the AI sound emitted by the magnification

registStatusChangeRate_AcsAnomaly.Wiki: Multiply the ACS Anomaly resistance value by the set multiplier

registStatusChangeRate_ElecDischarge.Wiki: Multiply the Electric Discharge resistance value by the set magnification

registStatusChangeRate_Plasma.Wiki: Multiply the Plasma resistance value by the set magnification

registStatusChangeRate_ElecDischargeType.Wiki: Multiply the Unknown resistance value by the set multiplier

soulStealRate.Wiki: Defense against HP robbed by NPCs in Soul Steel

hpRecoverRate.Wiki: It doesn't work when HP decreases.

replaceSpEffectId.Wiki: Special effect ID added at the end of life (-1 is ignored)

cycleOccurenceSpEffectId.Wiki: Special effect ID that occurs in each activation cycle (-1 is ignored)

atkOccurenceSpEffectId.Wiki: Special effect ID that occurs when hitting an attack (-1 is ignored)

guardDefFlickPowerRate.Wiki: Repellent defense correction value when guarding

guardStaminaCutRate.Wiki: Stamina cut rate correction value when guarding

rayCastPassedTime.Wiki: Passing the line of sight: Activation time [ms] (for evil eye)

changeSuperArmorPoint.Wiki: Value to add to the super armor value

bowDistRate.Wiki: Correction value added to the flight distance correction of the weapon

spCategory.Wiki: Categories that determine behavior such as overwriting special effects

categoryPriority.Wiki: Priority within the same category (lower one has priority)

changeMagicSlot.Wiki: You can increase the specified number of magic registration slots

changeMiracleSlot.Wiki: You can increase the specified number of trajectory registration frames.

heroPointDamage.Wiki: Damage value given to human nature value

defFlickPower.Wiki: Set a value that overwrites the repelling defense

flickDamageCutRate.Wiki: Set a value that overwrites the damage attenuation rate at the time of repelling

bloodDamageRate.Wiki: Point damage of state change type [bleeding], correction value used only when% damage

dmgLv_None.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv0

dmgLv_S.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv1

dmgLv_M.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv2

dmgLv_L.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv3

dmgLv_BlowM.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv4

dmgLv_Push.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv5

dmgLv_Strike.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv6

dmgLv_BlowS.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv7

dmgLv_Min.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv8

dmgLv_Uppercut.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv9

dmgLv_BlowLL.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv10

dmgLv_Breath.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv11

atkAttribute.Wiki: Physical attributes to set for special effects

spAttribute.Wiki: Special attributes to set for special effects

wepParamChange.Wiki: Specify which weapon is effective. If there is no limit, all attacks and defenses including enemies are targeted

moveType.Wiki: Movement type. Change the movement speed.

throwCondition.Wiki: Throwing conditions. Affects the throwing mask.

addBehaviorJudgeId_condition.Wiki: Condition value to add a value to the action judgment ID (Def: -1)

freezeDamageRate.Wiki: Correction value used only for point damage and% damage of state change type [cold air]

effectTargetSelf.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetFriend.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetEnemy.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetPlayer.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetAI.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetLive.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetGhost.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetWhiteGhost.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetBlackGhost.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetAttacker.Wiki: Apply special effects to attackers after damage (cannot enter defenders)

dispIconNonactive.Wiki: The icon is displayed even in the state of waiting for activation.

bAdjustMagicAbility.Wiki: Do you want to correct the magic power?

bGameClearBonus.Wiki: Whether it is for the game clear lap bonus.

magParamChange.Wiki: Set whether or not it is effective against magic

miracleParamChange.Wiki: Set whether or not it is effective against miracles

requestSos.Wiki: If checked, issue an SOS sign request when activated

requestBlackSos.Wiki: If checked, issue a black SOS sign request when activated

requestForceJoinBlackSos.Wiki: If checked, issue an intrusion_A request when activated

requestKickSession.Wiki: If checked, a kick request will be issued at the time of activation.

requestLeaveSession.Wiki: If checked, an exit request will be issued at the time of activation.

requestNpcInvade.Wiki: If checked, an intrusion request to the NPC will be issued at the time of activation.

noDead.Wiki: Whether you can be corpse. With this check, you will not be dead

bCurrHPIndependeMaxHP.Wiki: Does HP now affect even if the maximum HP increases or decreases?

corrosionIgnore.Wiki: [State change type] ignores [Durability] decrease due to [Corrosion]

antiMagicIgnore.Wiki: You can use magic even in the anti-magic range

fakeTargetIgnore.Wiki: Don't get caught in the fake target that occurred

fakeTargetIgnoreUndead.Wiki: You will not be caught by the fake target of the human system that occurred

fakeTargetIgnoreAnimal.Wiki: You will not be caught by the fake target of the beast system that occurred

disableStatus_AcsAnomaly.Wiki: If this effect is applied, it will not be affected by ACS Anomaly.

disableStatus_ElecDischarge.Wiki: If this effect is applied, you will not be affected by Electric Discharge

disableStatus_Plasma.Wiki: With this effect, you will not be affected by Plasma

disableStatus_ElecDischargeType2.Wiki: With this effect, you won't be cursed

disableStatus_Uranium.Wiki: With this effect, you won't be cursed

enableCharm.Wiki: If this effect is applied, you will be fascinated.

enableLifeTime.Wiki: Will the life be extended when the flag is set by TAE?

bAdjustStrengthAblity.Wiki: Do you want to correct your strength?

bAdjustAgilityAblity.Wiki: Do you want to correct your workmanship?

eraseOnBonfireRecover.Wiki: Will it be extinguished by bonfire recovery?

chargeAttackParamChange.Wiki: Set whether or not it is effective against charged attacks

throwAttackParamChange.Wiki: Set whether or not it is effective against throwing attacks

requestLeaveColiseumSession.Wiki: If checked, a request to leave the arena will be issued at the time of activation.

isExtendSpEffectLife.Wiki: Whether to be eligible for extension when the life extension effect is applied

hasTarget.Wiki: Do you know the enemy? : [Activation condition] (for evil eye users)

repAtkDmgLv.Wiki: The damage level of the attacking side changes to this value

sightSearchRate.Wiki: Correct the ease of finding with a magnification

effectTargetOpposeTarget.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetFriendlyTarget.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetSelfTarget.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetPcHorse.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetPcDeceased.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

isContractSpEffectLife.Wiki: Whether it will be shortened when the life shortening effect is applied

isWaitModeDelete.Wiki: Do you want to delete it the moment you are in a waiting state?

isIgnoreNoDamage.Wiki: Whether to apply the damage from this special effect even in the invincible state only when the state change type Apply the activation function even when invincible is applied.

changeTeamType.Wiki: Overwrites the specified team type. Requires State Info 132

accumuOverFireId.Wiki: Special effect Id activated at the upper limit of the spirit ball

accumuUnderFireId.Wiki: Special effect Id activated at the lower limit of the spirit ball

registStatus_Uranium.Wiki: Numerical value to be added to the target Unknown resistance when hit. Requires State Info 260

AppearAiSoundId.Wiki: Generates AI sound parameters with set values

addFootEffectSfxId.AltName: Automatic Foot Effect - SFX ID Offset
addFootEffectSfxId.Wiki: The identifier of the foot effect that is additionally generated during special effects. XYYZZZ ZZZ

dexterityCancelSystemOnlyAddDexterity.Wiki: Add this value when calculating the end timing of the TAE flag of Skill Cancel.

teamOffenseEffectivity.Wiki: Overwrite and change the target [Team Attack Influence] value. Do not change the default value (-1).

weakDmgRateA.Wiki: Special Attack A Damage multiplier is corrected. 1 is normal.

weakDmgRateB.Wiki: Special attack B Damage multiplier is corrected. 1 is normal.

weakDmgRateC.Wiki: Special attack C Damage multiplier is corrected. 1 is normal.

weakDmgRateD.Wiki: Special attack D Damage multiplier is corrected. 1 is normal.

weakDmgRateE.Wiki: Special attack E Damage multiplier is corrected. 1 is normal.

weakDmgRateF.Wiki: Special attack F Damage multiplier is corrected. 1 is normal.

darkDamageCutRate.Wiki: Dark damage multiplier: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

darkDiffenceRate.Wiki: Multiply the darkness defense by the set value

darkDiffence.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for darkness defense

darkAttackRate.Wiki: Dark damage multiplier: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

darkAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiply the dark attack power by the set value

darkAttackPower.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for the dark attack power

antiDarkSightRadius.Wiki: Radius of full view of darkness [m]. If you are within this distance, you will be able to see at normal distance even in the dark.

antiDarkSightDmypolyId.AltName: Full View in Darkness - Dummy Poly ID
antiDarkSightDmypolyId.Wiki: Damipoli ID (-1: Master) with full view of darkness. Create a full view area around this Damipoli

conditionHpRate.Wiki: Activates only when you have HP above the specified value

consumeStaminaRate.Wiki: Multiply by multiplying the consumption stamina value of the behavior parameter

itemDropRate.Wiki: The set value is added to [Item Drop Correction] Requires State Info 66

changeStatusPoint_AcsAnomaly.Wiki: Increase or decrease the state resistance value

changeStatusPoint_ElecDischarge.Wiki: Increase or decrease the state resistance value

changeStatusPoint_Plasma.Wiki: Increase or decrease the state resistance value

changeStatusPoint_ElecDischargeType2.Wiki: Increase or decrease the state resistance value

changeStatusPoint_Uranium.Wiki: Increase or decrease the state resistance value

slashAttackRate.Wiki: Slash damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

blowAttackRate.Wiki: Batter damage ratio: The calculated damage is corrected by XX times. 1 is normal.

thrustAttackRate.Wiki: Puncture damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

neutralAttackRate.Wiki: Non-attribute damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

slashAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiply the slashing attack power by the set value

blowAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiply the hit attack power by the set value

thrustAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiply the piercing attack power by the set value

neutralAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiply the non-attribute attack power by the set value

slashAttackPower.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for the slashing attack power

blowAttackPower.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for the batter attack power

thrustAttackPower.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for the piercing attack power

neutralAttackPower.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for non-attribute attack power

changeStrengthPoint.Wiki: Add or subtract the correction value of the weapon

changeAgilityPoint.Wiki: Add or subtract the correction value of the weapon

changeMagicPoint.Wiki: Add or subtract the correction value of the weapon

changeFaithPoint.Wiki: Add or subtract the correction value of the weapon

changeLuckPoint.Wiki: Add or subtract the correction value of the weapon

isUseStatusAilmentAtkPowerCorrect.AltName: Use Status Ailment Attack Power Correction
isUseStatusAilmentAtkPowerCorrect.Wiki: If , the abnormal state attack power multiplier correction of the attack para is applied.

isUseAtkParamAtkPowerCorrect.Wiki: If , the attack power multiplier correction of the attack para is applied.

dontDeleteOnDead.Wiki: If it is , it will not be deleted even if the character dies. Mainly used for death effects.

isDisableNetSync.Wiki: Do not synchronize with the net. It does not mean that you will be able to call it locally, but simply do not send it online. For example, a remote character does not activate locally, so nothing happens in that case.

shamanParamChange.Wiki: Set whether or not it is effective against spells

isStopSearchedNotify.Wiki: Whether to stop notifications targeting your army (used by EventMaker decisions and buddy platoons)

isCheckAboveShadowTest.Wiki: If it is , it will not be applied when it is judged to be shielded ( is always applied)

addBehaviorJudgeId_add.AltName: Add Behavior Judgment ID - Addition Value
addBehaviorJudgeId_add.Wiki: If the addition value of the action judgment ID is 0, the action is not switched and the action is stopped.

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Kinetic.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the player.

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Energy.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the player.

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Explosive.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the player.

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Coral.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the player.

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Dark.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the player.

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Kinetic.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the enemy.

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Energy.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the enemy.

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Explosive.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the enemy.

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Coral.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the enemy.

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Dark.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the enemy.

defObjDmgCorrectRate.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from OBJ.

atkPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Kinetic.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value given to the player.

atkPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Energy.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value given to the player.

atkPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Explosive.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value given to the player.

atkPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Coral.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value given to the player.

atkPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Dark.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value given to the player.

atkEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Kinetic.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value given to the enemy.

atkEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Energy.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value given to the enemy.

atkEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Explosive.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value given to the enemy.

atkEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Coral.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value given to the enemy.

atkEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Dark.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value given to the enemy.

registStatusChangeRate_Uranium.Wiki: Multiply the cold resistance value by the set magnification

hearingAiSoundLevel.Wiki: Overwrite how good your ears are

chrProxyHeightRate.Wiki: Magnification over the height of the character capsule

addAwarePointCorrectValue_forTarget.Wiki: Searching degree addition correction _ side to be seen

sightSearchEnemyAdd.Wiki: Correct the ease of finding with a real number

sightSearchAdd.Wiki: Correct the ease of finding with a real number

hearingSearchAdd.Wiki: Correct the hearing of AI sounds with real numbers

hearingSearchRate.Wiki: Correct the audibility of AI sound by magnification

hearingSearchEnemyAdd.Wiki: Correct the loudness of the emitted AI sound with a real number

energyCapacityRate.Wiki: Affects energy capacity in a multiplicative manner.

energySupplyEfficiencyRate.Wiki: Affects energy supply efficiency in a multiplicative manner.

energyCostRate.Wiki: Affects energy costs in a multiplicative manner.

changeEnergyRate.Wiki: Affects current energy value in a multiplicative manner.

changeEnergyPoint.Wiki: Affects current energy value in a flat manner.

energyPostRecoverySupplyRate.Wiki: Affects energy supply rate post-recovery in a multiplicative manner.

damageCutRate_Impact_1.Wiki: Affects the total amount of impact damage taken in a multiplicative manner.

damageCutRate_Impact_2.Wiki: Affects the total amount of impact damage taken in a multiplicative manner.

attitudeStabilityRate_1.Wiki: Affects the total amount of stability in a multiplicative manner.

attitudeStabilityRate_2.Wiki: Affects the total amount of stability in a multiplicative manner.

attackRate_Impact.Wiki: Affects the total amount of impact damage done in a multiplicative manner.

coreExpansionCooldownRate.Wiki: Affects the cooldown of Core Expansions.

attitudeStabilityRecoveryRate.Wiki: Affects the recovery rate of Attitude Stability.

Self.Wiki: Defines various effects that can be applied to the player and to enemies.\nCan define passive, activated, single-use and repeated or continuous application effects with indefinite duration.\nSuccessful application may depend on spCategory or invocationConditions.
